Posted By: EpicBroccoli (1/27/2011 3:33:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
It's funny how the art depicts exactly for what it will be used: Killing 1/1 Goblin tokens from Cards like [Kuldotha Rebirth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kuldotha Rebirth).  
  
The fact that the creatures get real -1/-1 counter instead of *"until end of turn -1/-1"* also means it's a heavy anti-boros card. Many of Boros creatures can get big with landfall but are just 1/1 at the end of day which means their death with a single -1/-1 counter.
posts.html:
